title: Pixel 4 July 2020 Security Update - LTE No Longer Connecting, Forced to switch to 3G. TMOBILE
content:
My Pixel 4 got the July 2020 security update this morning. After the update LTE no longer works and I am forced to manually switch to 3G in order to be able to make calls.

Turning off WiFi and removing then re-inserting the sim card appears to allow LTE to connect again in the status bar, but when I attempt to make a call I get a pop up stating 'Mobile network is not available'.
WiFi calling also does not work unless I am connected to 3G.

This doesn't appear to be a network issue with TMobile as I have another identical Pixel 4 that has not been updated with the latest security patch and LTE works fine.

Any resolutions to this?
Am I going to have to wait for another security patch for this to get fixed?
